DOC.brief_summary: The Trident Tritanium acetabular component total hip prosthesis new develop uncemented acetabular component . In randomized control trial ( RCT ) tritanium cup compare Trident HA acetabular component two equal size group . The Symax HA coat stem use femoral component group . Study Objectives : - The primary objective determine prosthetic migration uncemented acetabular femoral total hip component use model base RSA technique - Secondary objective one hand assess clinical outcome hand assess patient satisfaction group use Harris Hip Score , Oxford Hip Score , WOMAC , EQ-5D questionnaires - Tertiary objective ass bone remodel uncemented acetabular component HA-coated Symax hip stem use QCT derive usinf F18-fluoride PET cohort 12 consecutive patient RCT A total 50 patient enrol RCT divide two equal group . Patients fulfill inclusion exclusion criterion . All evaluation do pre-operatively 2 week surgery , surgery 4 week , 3 6 month 1 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: RSA Study Using Two Types Uncemented Acetabular Components Uncemented HA Coated Symax Stem
DOC.criteria: Patients BMI < 35 Patients require uncemented primary THA Primary diagnosis osteoarthritis patient acetabular femoral osteotomy Patients THA contralateral side within last 6 month Female patient pregnant plan pregnancy course study Patients active suspected infection patient malignancy patient systemic disease would effect subject 's welfare overall outcome study Patients neuromuscular neurosensory deficit would limit ability assess performance device Patients systemic metabolic disorder lead progressive bone deterioration Patients illnesses likely affect outcome Patients know sensitivity device material
